module.name: resource_as_realized
module.keywords: module, resource, usage, consumption, record, assignment

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of resources used or consumed by e.g. an activity.

ul.li: Refer to a defined resource item;
Be referenced by one or more activities;
Be related back to the corresponding resource requirement.

purpose.p: The following are not enabled by this module alone but are enabled by modules that use this module:

ul.li: Property, date and descriptive representation assignments.

purpose.note:
A resource record can be given an identifier using the resource_as_realized_identification_item in the
Resource as realized characterized module.

inscope.li: Recording of resources used or consumed by activities, organizations etc;
Recording of usage or consumption of actual as well as types of resource items;
Recording of the relationship between the resource as realized and the corresponding resource requirement statements;
Recording of the relationship between the resource as realized and the corresponding resource events.

outscope.li: Identification and detailed descriptions of recorded resources;
